page.title: 17LESWALT ADULT ASSOCIATIONS
page.content: The Larbrax Recreation Club was founded in 1958 by Mr.T.Cluckie as an indoor bowling Club. From Larbrax to Drumlochart Caravan Park it has now settled in Leswalt Hall. Meetings, for adults and children, are held twice weekly, funded by subscription. The Leswalt Church Young Women's Group was founded in 1972 and organised today by an elected committee. Open to young women of and denomination, the president is a member of the Church of Scotland. Funds are raised by various activities and a subscription is paid to the C.of S. in Edinburgh. Meetings are held fortnightly from October to March, visiting speakers attend, concert parties are organised as is a baby-sitting circle. One major fund raiser per session is organised for the Church.
